title: Grand Theft Auto - San Andreas v1.02 [Android]
description:
System requirements:
-. Architecture: ARMv7
-. Platform: Android OS 2.3 and above
-. Resolution: Multiscreen
-. Support Multitouch: Present

Five years ago Carl Johnson escaped from the Los Santos, metropolis steeped in street wars, drug trafficking and corruption, home of movie stars and millionaires, trying to ignore the drug dealers and gangsters. 

The duration of the game - early 90s. Carl is forced to return to his hometown. His mother was killed, brother and sister had a falling out, and childhood friends - on shit. 

Features Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas: 
-. Improved graphics for mobile devices: increased resolution, redesigned light color palette, improved character models. 
-. Supports sync saved games via cloud services for members of Rockstar Social Club. 
-. Two virtual analog joystick to control the camera and movement. 
-. Three different control schemes and customizable buttons with context mapping. 
-. Support for wireless controllers MoGa, as well as some gamepads via Bluetooth and USB. 
-. Support system feedback Immersion. 
-. Customizable display options for a variety of platforms.
-. Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese.
